MatchedRegions.transcript: First of all, I would like to introduce the motivation of our work.
As we all know, animal pose estimation is crucial in animal behavior understanding and wildlife conservation.

MatchedRegion.Text: Although there is abundant human pose estimation datasets, animal pose estimation datasets are largely ignored, especially for video-based animal pose estimation, although it is crucial in animal behavior understanding and wildlife conservation.

MatchedRegions.transcript: But animal pose estimation datasets are largely ignored.

MatchedRegion.Text: Although there is abundant human pose estimation datasets, animal pose estimation datasets are largely ignored, especially for video-based animal pose estimation, although it is crucial in animal behavior understanding and wildlife conservation.

Besides, existing datasets for animal pose estimation are not available for tracking tasks because they do not have continuous time information. Likewise, datasets prepared for tracking tasks lack detailed keypoint annotations.

MatchedRegions.transcript: You really don't have continuous time information or lack detailed keypoint annotations.
